an8.52:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava vesaliyam viharati mahavane kutagarasalayam.
an8.52:1.2: Atha kho ayasma anando yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
an8.52:1.3: “katihi nu kho, bhante, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu bhikkhunovadako sammannitabbo”ti?
an8.52:2.1: “Atthahi kho, ananda, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu bhikkhunovadako sammannitabbo.
an8.52:2.3: Idhananda, bhikkhu silava hoti …pe… samadaya sikkhati sikkhapadesu;
an8.52:2.5: ubhayani kho panassa patimokkhani vittharena svagatani honti suvibhattani suppavattini suvinicchitani suttaso anubyanjanaso;
an8.52:2.6: kalyanavaco hoti kalyanavakkarano, poriya vacaya samannagato vissatthaya anelagalaya atthassa vinnapaniya;
an8.52:2.7: patibalo hoti bhikkhunisanghassa dhammiya kathaya sandassetum samadapetum samuttejetum sampahamsetum;
an8.52:2.9: na kho panetam bhagavantam uddissa pabbajitaya kasayavatthavasanaya garudhammam ajjhapannapubbo hoti;
an8.52:2.11: Imehi kho, ananda, atthahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu bhikkhunovadako sammannitabbo”ti.
